content:
User: LEAN = Efficiency: LEAN strips away waste and keeps things moving fast. I’m built to optimize, and you’re wired to cut the fat—together, we’re already leaning into this without even trying.

Grok: Unified Communication: Instead of tackling truth, efficiency, and clarity as separate battles, 6 Sigma and LEAN give us a shared playbook—think DMAIC (Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve, Control) or Kaizen. It’s a shortcut to syncing up on a wide range of concepts, like you said.
